DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the recommended dose of pemetrexed, cisplatin and radiotherapy in the treatment of patients with Small Cell Lung Cancer.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Treat Small Cell Lung Cancer With a Combination of Cisplatin, Pemetrexed, and Radiotherapy
DOC.criteria: Measurable disease with diagnosis of Small Cell Lung Cancer. Performance status of 0 to 1 on the Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status schedule. Patients must be at least 18 years of age and have at least a 12week life expectancy. No prior chemotherapy and/or prior thoracic radiotherapy. Adequate pulmonary function and organ function. Patients with myocardial infarction within the preceding six months. Diagnosis of a serious concomitant systemic disorder. Prior radiotherapy to the lower neck or abdominal region. Significant weight loss. Concurrent administration of any other antitumor therapy.
